articles.title: T20 World Cup: Pakistan cement semi-finals spot after Mohammad Rizwan, Babar Azam star in 45-run win over Namibia - India Today
articles.description: Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan produced yet another century-plus opening stand as Pakistan defeated Namibia by 45 runs in a Super 12 game of the ICC T20 World Cup in Abu Dhabi on Tuesday. With the win, the Pakistan side cemented their place in the semi-finals.
